public @NotNull Action buildMoveAction​(@NotNull

        Call this method to construct a Move Action
        Parameters:
        destination - is the point where player wants to be at the end of the Action
        Returns:
        the constructed action to move

      • buildWeaponGrabAction

        @NotNull
public @NotNull Action buildWeaponGrabAction​(@Nullable
                                             @Nullable java.awt.Point destination,
                                             @NotNull
                                             @NotNull Weapon weapon,
                                             @Nullable
                                             @Nullable Weapon discardedWeapon,
                                             @Nullable
                                             @Nullable java.util.List<PowerUp> alternativePayment)
        Call this method to construct an Action in order to grab a weapon
        Parameters:
        destination - if present, defines a position where player want to grab the weapon, if not present he has to be on a spawnpoint
        weapon - the weapon he wants to grab
        discardedWeapon - if the player has already 3 weapons this indicates the weapon he wants to drop in order to grab @param weapon
        alternativePayment - powerUps that player wants to discard in order to pay the cost to grab the @param weapon
        Returns:
        the constructed action to grab a weapon

      • buildAmmoCardGrabAction

        @NotNull
public @NotNull Action buildAmmoCardGrabAction​(@Nullable
                                               @Nullable java.awt.Point destination)
        Call this method to construct an Action in order to grab an ammoCard
        Parameters:
        destination - if present indicates in which square player wants to grab the ammocard, if not present the player wants to grab the ammocard in his actual position
        Returns:
        the constructed action to grab an ammo card

      • buildFireAction

        @NotNull
public @NotNull Action buildFireAction​(@NotNull
                                       @NotNull Weapon weapon,
                                       @Nullable
                                       @Nullable java.awt.Point destination,
                                       @Nullable
                                       @Nullable java.util.List<PowerUp> powerUpPayment,
                                       boolean alternativeFire,
                                       int options,
                                       @NotNull
                                       @NotNull java.util.List<java.util.UUID> basicTarget,
                                       @Nullable
                                       @Nullable java.awt.Point basicTargetPoint,
                                       @NotNull
                                       @NotNull java.util.List<java.util.UUID> firstAdditionalTarget,
                                       @Nullable
                                       @Nullable java.awt.Point firstAdditionalTargetPoint,
                                       @NotNull
                                       @NotNull java.util.List<java.util.UUID> secondAdditionalTarget,
                                       @Nullable
                                       @Nullable java.awt.Point secondAdditionalTargetPoint)
        Call this method to construct an Action in order to fire an enemy
        Parameters:
        weapon - indicates the weapon
        destination - indicates where he wants to move before shooting
        powerUpPayment - indicates powerUps he wants to pay costs
        alternativeFire - indicates if he wants to use the alternative mode of @param weapon
        options - indicates which @param weapon's effects he wants to use
        basicTarget - indicates targets of basic mode fire
        basicTargetPoint - indicates a point, meaning depends on @param weapon's basic mode fire
        firstAdditionalTarget - indicates targets of first additional mode fire
        firstAdditionalTargetPoint - indicates a point, meaning depends on @param weapon's first additional mode fire
        secondAdditionalTarget - indicates targets of second additional mode fire
        secondAdditionalTargetPoint - indicates a point, meaning depends on @param weapon's second additional mode fire
        Returns:
        the constructed action to fire

      • buildUsePowerUp

        @NotNull
public @NotNull Action buildUsePowerUp​(@NotNull
                                       PowerUp.Type powerUpType,
                                       @NotNull
                                       AmmoCard.Color color,
                                       @Nullable
                                       @Nullable java.awt.Point destination,
                                       @Nullable
                                       @Nullable java.util.UUID target)
        Call this method to construct an Action in order to use a Power Up's effect
        Parameters:
        powerUpType - the type of power up a player wants to use
        color - the color of the power up a player wants to use
        destination - fit this param with a point of the map if the specific power up needs it
        target - fit this param with a player if the specific power up needs it
        Returns:
        the constructed action to use a power up

      • buildReload

        @NotNull
public @NotNull Action buildReload​(@NotNull
                                   @NotNull Weapon weapon,
                                   @Nullable
                                   @Nullable java.util.List<PowerUp> powerUpPayment)
        Call this method to construct an Action in order to reload a weapon
        Parameters:
        weapon - fit this param with the name of the weapon player wants to reload
        powerUpPayment - the power ups player wants to use as payment instead of using cubes
        Returns:
        the constructed action to reload a weapon
